about.title: About IPC Hebron
about.subtitle: Neria, Belthangady TQ, D.K, Karnataka, India
about.missionText: Our mission is to glorify God by proclaiming the Gospel of Jesus Christ, being led by the Holy Spirit, making disciples, and demonstrating God's love through worship, word, and works.
about.whoWeAreText1: India Pentecostal Church Hebron (IPC Hebron) is a vibrant Pentecostal congregation located in Neria, Belthangady Taluk, Dakshina Kannada, Karnataka, India. We are a community of believers committed to following Jesus Christ and spreading His message of love, hope, and salvation.
about.whoWeAreText2: As a Pentecostal church, we believe in the power and presence of the Holy Spirit in our lives and worship. We emphasize the importance of prayer, worship, and the study of God's Word as foundational to our faith journey.
about.historyText: IPC Hebron was blessed and started in 1990. We honor the faithful pastors who have served our congregation throughout the years.
about.wordOfGodText: We believe the Bible is the inspired Word of God and the foundation for our faith and practice.
about.loveCommunityText: We demonstrate God's love through our relationships and service to one another and our community.
about.discipleshipText: We are committed to making disciples who follow Jesus and share His message with others.
about.pentecostalFaithText: As a Pentecostal church, we embrace the full work of the Holy Spirit in the life of the believer. We believe in:
pentecostalBeliefs: The baptism of the Holy Spirit with the evidence of speaking in tongues
The gifts of the Spirit for the edification of the church
Divine healing and miracles through faith in Jesus Christ
The importance of prayer and intercession
Worship that is vibrant, Spirit-led, and heartfelt

services.title: Service Times
services.subtitle: Join us for worship and fellowship
services.sundayDesc: Join us for our main worship service featuring praise and worship, prayer, and a message from God's Word. This is a time of fellowship, learning, and growing together in faith.
services.wednesdayDesc: Small group gatherings in homes for Bible study, prayer, and fellowship. These intimate meetings provide an opportunity for deeper connection and spiritual growth.
services.fridayDesc: A dedicated time of fasting and prayer where we seek God's face, intercede for our community, and experience the power of corporate prayer.
services.worshipText: Experience vibrant, Spirit-led worship with contemporary and traditional songs that honor God and invite His presence.
services.teachingText: Receive practical, Bible-based teaching that applies God's Word to everyday life and helps you grow in your faith.
services.fellowshipText: Connect with other believers in a warm, welcoming environment where everyone is valued and accepted.
services.prayerText: Join in corporate prayer and receive personal prayer ministry from our prayer team.

statementOfFaith.title: Statement of Faith
statementOfFaith.subtitle: Our foundational beliefs based on the Word of God

triuneGod.title: The Triune God
triuneGod.content: We believe in one living and true God, eternally existing as Father, Son, and Holy Spiritâ€”equal in power and glory. God created all things and continues to sustain and rule over all creation.

godFather.title: God the Father
godFather.content: We believe God the Father is eternal, all-knowing, ever-present, and all-powerful. He is holy and righteous, and His love was revealed through the sacrifice of His Son, Jesus Christ.

jesusChrist.title: Jesus Christ
jesusChrist.content: We believe in Jesus Christ, the Son of Godâ€”His virgin birth, sinless life, miracles, death for our sins, bodily resurrection, ascension to heaven, and His glorious return.

holyScriptures.title: The Holy Scriptures
holyScriptures.content: We believe the Bible, both Old and New Testaments, is the inspired Word of God and the final authority for faith and Christian living.

holySpirit.title: The Holy Spirit
holySpirit.content: We believe in the Holy Spirit, who convicts the world of sin, brings new life, sanctifies believers, and empowers them for godly living and ministry.

giftsBaptism.title: Gifts and Baptism of the Holy Spirit
giftsBaptism.content: We believe in the present work of the Holy Spirit and the operation of spiritual gifts. These gifts are to be used in love, unity, and order. We believe Jesus baptizes believers with the Holy Spirit for empowered service.

salvation.title: Salvation
salvation.content: We believe salvation is a gift of God, received by grace through faith in Jesus Christâ€”not by human worksâ€”and results in a transformed life.

sinNewBirth.title: Sin and New Birth
sinNewBirth.content: We believe all people are sinners and need salvation. Those who repent and confess Jesus Christ are born again by the Holy Spirit.

layingOnHands.title: Laying on of Hands
layingOnHands.content: We believe in the laying on of hands for the baptism of the Holy Spirit, ordination into ministry, and healing through the power of God.

church.title: The Church
church.content: We believe in one universal Church, the Body of Christ, made up of all believers, with Jesus Christ as its head.

ordinances.title: Church Ordinances
ordinances.content: We believe Jesus Christ established two ordinances for the Church: water baptism by immersion and the Lord's Supper.

sanctification.title: Sanctification
sanctification.content: We believe sanctification is the ongoing work of God that sets believers apart from sin and dedicates them to holy living.

lastThings.title: Last Things
lastThings.content: We believe in the rapture of the Church, the visible return of Jesus Christ, the resurrection of the dead, final judgment, eternal life for the righteous, and eternal separation for the wicked.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our church family about how God is working in their lives

testimonial1.name: Srini Sham
testimonial1.text: Really blessed to be part of the church family where focus is on Jesus. God has anointed and transformed my life. The word of God shared here enriches me. Glad to be here. Praise God.

testimonial2.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial2.text: IPC Hebron has been a blessing in my life. The worship services are powerful, and the teaching of God's word has helped me grow spiritually. I'm grateful for this church family.

testimonial3.name: David Kumar
testimonial3.text: The love and fellowship I've experienced here is amazing. The prayers and support from the church community have been instrumental in my spiritual journey. Thank you, IPC Hebron!

testimonial4.name: Priya Menon
testimonial4.text: Being part of IPC Hebron has transformed my relationship with God. The Holy Spirit moves powerfully here, and I've seen God's faithfulness in every area of my life.

testimonial5.name: Michael Thomas
testimonial5.text: This church is truly a place where God's presence is felt. The ministry, worship, and fellowship have been life-changing. I'm blessed to call IPC Hebron my home church.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.subtitle: A journey of faith, dedication, and God's faithfulness since 1990

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.paragraph1: IPC Hebron Neria was blessed and established in the year 1990, founded by the visionary leadership of Pr K P Babu.
beginning.paragraph2: With a heart for God and a passion for ministry, Pr K P Babu laid the cornerstone of our church, creating a place where the Gospel could be proclaimed and lives transformed.
beginning.paragraph3: From humble beginnings, our church has grown into a vibrant community of believers, dedicated to serving God and reaching out to our neighbors with the love of Christ.
beginning.paragraph4: Through the years, we have remained committed to our mission of making disciples, building community, and advancing God's kingdom in Neria and beyond.

history.title: Our History
history.description: IPC Hebron was blessed and started in 1990. We honor the faithful pastors who have served our congregation throughout the years.

kPBabu.name: Pr K P Babu
kPBabu.description: Pr K P Babu was the founding pastor who established IPC Hebron in 1990. His vision and dedication laid the foundation for our church, and his faithful service for 7 years set the course for our ministry.

pPDaniel.name: Pr P P Daniel
pPDaniel.description: Pr P P Daniel served our church with great commitment for 4 years. His leadership strengthened our congregation and continued the work of building a strong foundation in faith and community.

rajuKJ.name: Pr Raju KJ
rajuKJ.description: Pr Raju KJ led our church for 5 years with wisdom and grace. During his tenure, the church experienced significant growth in membership and expanded its ministry outreach to the community.

rajuCS.name: Pr Raju CS
rajuCS.description: Pr Raju CS served our congregation for 3 years with passion and dedication. His teaching ministry and pastoral care blessed many families and strengthened the spiritual foundation of our church.

josePaul.name: Pr Jose Paul
josePaul.description: Pr Jose Paul ministered to our church for 3 years with faithfulness and love. His emphasis on prayer and worship brought renewal to our congregation and deepened our relationship with God.

matthai.name: Pr Matthai
matthai.description: Pr Matthai served our church with dedication and commitment for 4 years. His leadership brought stability and growth to our congregation, strengthening our faith and community bonds.

aby.name: Pr Aby
aby.description: Pr Aby served our church for 5 years with great commitment. His leadership focused on discipleship and community building, leaving a lasting impact on the spiritual growth of our members.

roy.name: Pr Roy
roy.description: Pr Roy led our congregation for 2 years with wisdom and compassion. His ministry emphasized evangelism and outreach, bringing many new souls to Christ and expanding our church's impact in the community.

suresh.name: Pr Suresh
suresh.description: Pr Suresh is currently serving as our Senior Pastor, leading the congregation with vision and dedication. Under his leadership, the church continues to grow in faith, impact, and service to God and the community.
